about_the_game:
Experience what some would describe as their worst nightmare.
As a passenger on an airliner, you wake up after having a nightmare and realize, there seems to be no one else on board except you. After the power supply fails, the only thing that matters is getting out of there. But how do you get out of a machine 9,000 meters above the ground? To make matters worse, it doesn't take long until you notice that you're not alone at all. It's unclear what's on board with you, but what is clear is that it's not human.

LIGHT AND DARK - Since the power supply has failed, the light does not work either. To be able to move around on the plane, you have to use the your flashlight and a night vision camera. But use them wisely. Energy is a finite resource.

HIDE AND SURVIVE - Right after waking up you will realize that you will not get far with an offensive approach. Plan your next steps carefully and avoid dangers as much as possible.

An exciting and, above all, spooky adventure full of unexpected twists and turns awaits you. Driven by pure fear, you make your way through the gigantic plane accompanied by a scary atmosphere.

Are you ready for takeoff?

content_descriptors.notes: Deals with human corpses, blood and suicide.

short_description: In Aviophobia, you take on the role of a airline passenger who suddenly is all alone. Or is he? After a large part of the power supply has failed, you quickly realize that something isn't right. Now it's up to you to find out what's going on here and how to get off this plane as fast as possible.
